entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
